pr_title: MULE-17873: do not fail on runtime when metadata keys has no type res…

timeline.message: MULE-17873: do not fail on runtime when metadata keys has no type resolver

timeline.bodyText: make this the very first condition so that mule startup doesn't go through unnecessary processing.
timeline.author: marianogonzalez

timeline.bodyText: this looks like something we would do (or we potentially are doing) in several places. Move this to org.mule.runtime.module.extension.api.util.MuleExtensionUtils and check for other places where this code is repeated.
timeline.author: marianogonzalez
marianogonzalez
